forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 10am. Sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 1 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 44. West northwest wind 3 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle clarity begins to replace the remnants of patchy fog that graced the city earlier. The crisp air carries hints of coolness, with temperatures poised to settle near a mild 56, although they may dip slightly into the afternoon’s embrace. The sky, a soft canvas of blue, invites sunlight to spill over the iconic silhouettes of the city, though some distant whispers of marine layer linger just beyond the horizon, suggestive of a coastal presence without encroaching on the day’s vibrancy. 

As night approaches, the city will don a partly cloudy cloak, enveloping the landscape in a tranquil embrace, with temperatures descending to around 44. Those venturing out might consider layering—a light sweater complemented by a snug jacket for the evening chill. Today offers an ideal opportunity to stroll through local parks, indulge in an afternoon coffee at a favorite café, or enjoy a leisurely visit to one of the city’s art galleries, savoring the quiet pleasures that a clear, cool day brings.
